page.title: 05ST.SAMPSON'S SCHOOL
page.content: There are 4 secondary schools on the island,1 Grammar school and some private schools.St.Sampsons secondary school is set in Delancey Park.There are{572}children taught by {40} teachers.The school children can take O-levels and CSE's and can leave school at 15yrs.of age.They have 14 computers.They have a compulsory navy uniform.At 16 they can transfer to Grammar school to take further exams. The States of Guernsey plan spending more money in the future as their school was built in 1906.The numbers have gone up and although their gym is almost brand new they still need improvements. Most children get jobs after leaving school.All subjects are covered including electronics. Close by is an Infant school and a new Catholic Primary school.
